resources.string: The application is designed to help people get rehabilitation at home after injury
Exercise 1: The starting position is standing. Roll a small ball over the entire surface of the foot.
Please fill out the questionnaire and send it to your doctor, so it will be easier for him to monitor the state of your rehabilitation
Was it painful when doing the exercises?
What exercises failed to do? (If there are none, leave the field empty)
Exercise 2: Starting position - lying on your stomach, hand on the lower back (for control). The operated leg is lifted up by 10-15 sm . and we perform dynamic exercises. Perform 8-10 times.
Before using this application, be sure to consult with your doctor
Choose the date of your next training

Exercise 3: Starting position - lying on your back. Raise a straight leg by 10 degrees, 20 degrees, 30 degrees. Hold at each level for 7-10 seconds, slowly return to the starting position. Perform alternately with each leg 10-15 times.
Exercise 4: Starting position - lying on the side of the operated leg, the upper leg is bent at the knee, resting in front of the other leg. Perform lifting of the operated leg. Perform 10-15 times.
